revised_title: Exploration of Natural Curiosities and Diving Techniques in the East Indies
tldr: The author, R. Moray, shares information about the diving abilities of pearl divers, the extraction of oils and other substances from plants and trees, and the presence of unique creatures in the East Indies. He also mentions various botanical curiosities, including the nutmeg called Thieving and the fragrant oil drawn from the bark of a Lawang tree.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Natural History
